editor/title.when: config.git_monolithic.enabled && !git_monolithic.context.missing && git_monolithic.context.openRepositoryCount != 0 && !isInDiffEditor && resourceScheme == file && resourcePath in git_monolithic.context.changedResources

git_monolithic.githubAuthentication.deprecationMessage: This setting is now deprecated, please use `github.gitAuthentication` instead.
